miniQuotes.text: And He found you lost and guided you.Yahya
miniQuotes.author: Qur’an 93:7

miniQuotes.text: Do not lose hope, nor be sad.
miniQuotes.author: Qur’an 3:139

miniQuotes.text: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
miniQuotes.author: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ (Sahih al-Bukhari)

miniQuotes.text: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
miniQuotes.author: Qur’an 2:286

miniQuotes.text: And whoever puts their trust in Allah – then He alone is sufficient for them.
miniQuotes.author: Qur’an 65:3

miniQuotes.text: A believer is not stung twice from the same hole.
miniQuotes.author: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ (Sahih al-Bukhari)

miniQuotes.text: So verily, with the hardship, there is relief.
miniQuotes.author: Qur’an 94:5

miniQuotes.text: The strong man is not the good wrestler; the strong man is only the one who controls himself when he is angry.
miniQuotes.author: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ (Sahih al-Bukhari)

miniQuotes.text: And He found you lost and guided you.
miniQuotes.author: Qur’an 93:7

miniQuotes.text: Wealth is not in having many possessions, but in having contentment of the soul.
miniQuotes.author: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ (Sahih Muslim)

heroQuotes.text: Indeed, with hardship will be ease.
heroQuotes.author: Qur’an 94:6

heroQuotes.text: The best of you are those who learn the Qur’an and teach it.
heroQuotes.author: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ (Sahih al-Bukhari)

heroQuotes.text: And whoever puts their trust in Allah – then He alone is sufficient for them.
heroQuotes.author: Qur’an 65:3

heroQuotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
heroQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

heroQuotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
heroQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

heroQuotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
heroQuotes.author: Winston Churchill

heroQuotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
heroQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

heroQuotes.text: Dream big and dare to fail.
heroQuotes.author: Norman Vaughan

heroQuotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
heroQuotes.author: William James

heroQuotes.text: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
heroQuotes.author: Sam Levenson

heroQuotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
heroQuotes.author: C.S. Lewis

heroQuotes.text: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
heroQuotes.author: Nelson Mandela
